Box 66 â 20116 Gilgil Hotel Nairobi Indian Ocean Beach resort Lake Elementaita Lodge Established in 1964, Jacaranda Group of Hotels has established itself as one of the leading, locally founded hotel brands in Kenya. We currently comprise of three properties across the country; Jacaranda Hotel Nairobi, located in Westlands, Jacaranda Indian Ocean Beach Resort, in Diani, and Jacaranda Lake Elementaita Lodge. Jacaranda Group of Hotels operates on values and philosophies of integrity, hard work, professionalism, respect and reliability. P.O. Meet the Team & Golf Instruction Free Lessons Search Login Register Home Book a Tee Time Golf East Course West Course Golf Rates Meet the Team & Golf Instruction Instructional Videos Stay & Play Which Tee do I Play? Membership Tournament Calendar Groups & Events Tournaments & Outings Weddings & Banquets Explore More Dining Broward Amateur Championship Shop Career Opportunities Blogs FAQ Contact Us MEET THE TEAM & INSTRUCTION GOLF INSTRUCTION ANDREW MICHAEL, PGA General Manager amichael@jacarandagolfclub.com Andrew Michael was elevated to the position of General Manager after a long and successful run in golf operations at Jacaranda. He  joined the team in early 2008 and worked his way up to the Director of Golf position by 2011. He was able to secure his PGA Class A Professional status by 2014. Andrew has taught over 5000 hours of lessons throughout his career and has studied under prestigious golf instructors that helped shaped his approach to teaching the game of Golf. He has worked with numerous Amateur, Collegiate, and Professional Champions. On becoming GM, Andrew says," I am truly honored and excited to accept the role of General Manager at Jacaranda Golf Club. It is with great enthusiasm that I look forward to leading our team in providing you with an exceptional experience. We are committed to ensuring that your visit reflects our dedication to unparalleled customer service and top-notch course conditions. We hope you will truly “experience the difference” during your time with us. LESSONS AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST KEVIN CUERVO Director of Golf kcuervo@jacarandagolfclub.com Kevin Cuervo started as Jacaranda Golf Club's Director of Golf in October, 2024. Prior to joining Jacaranda, Kevin held a number of positions at the highly-regarded Trump National Doral. His most recent being Golf Operations Manager. Kevin is enrolled in the PGA Professional Golf Management Program, having completed  his Level 1 coursework- PAT, (Playing Ability Test), in May of 2023 The South Florida native is a graduate of Cornell University with a B.S. in Appled Economics and Management, FInance. On joining Jacaranda, Kevin says, " I am thrilled to help lead this top-notch golf operation and work hard-in-hand with its amazlingly talented management team. It's an exciting time to be at Jacaranda with our owners preparing to invest heavily in the facility in order to take it to the next level. Jacaranda was already a star in the world of semi-private courses in Broward. After renovations, the sky's the limit!" LESSONS AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST BRYAN SIENKIEWICZ, PGA First Assistant Golf Professional bsienkiewicz@jacarandagolfclub.com $50 per half hour | $90 per hour Multiple Player Lessons $50 per hour (per person) 9 Hole Playing Lesson $160 After Graduating from Broward College with a A.S. Degree in Criminal Justice in 2012, Bryan made the jump into the Golf Business and never looked back. Originally starting at Pine Island Ridge Country Club as a Bag staff attendant, he worked his way up to holding multiple jobs at the facility including Ranger, Starter, and Pro Shop Assistant. Bryan joined the Jacaranda team in 2013 as a Bag staff attendant but quickly worked his way into the Lead Assistant Professional/Merchandiser role. He is a PGA Class A Professional and enjoys working with the newest generation of golfers. “I like to Teach Juniors, it is a real passion of mine to grow the game through our youth. With that being said I also work seasonally for NSU University School as the Head Coach for Girls Varsity Golf team and assistant coach for the Boys Varsity Team.” “My method of teaching is very casual. I like to take golf terminology, and relate it to everyday experiences to help golfers comprehend faster as well as hold information easier. This allows players to take their learnings to the course and enjoy this game that I have for over 25 years.” The golf swing can be as easy as this mathematical equation 2+2= ___. Let’s solve this simple problem together. ELEVATE YOUR GAME Whether you are an experienced amateur or a beginner looking to break into the sport, our golf instructors cater their lessons to your skill level. Our General Manager, Andrew Michael, PGA and his staff of golf professionals work on the fundamentals of the game, including putting, chipping, pitching, sand play, full swings, and much more. Want to take your golf game to the next level? Call Jacaranda today at (954) 472-5836 for more information about golf lessons to suit your individual needs. Jacaranda Golf Club 9200 West Broward Blvd. Plantation, FL 33324 Phone: 954.472.5836 Fax: 954.472.7794 info@jacarandagolfclub.com Pro Shop Hours **Range Hours May Vary** Monday: 6:30AM - 5:30PM Tuesday: 6:30AM - 5:30PM Wednesday: 6:30AM - 5:30PM Thursday: 6:30AM - 5:30PM Friday: 6:30AM - 5:30PM Saturday: 6:30AM - 5:30PM Sunday: 6:30AM - 5:30PM Quick Links Book A Tee Time Leave a Review Directions Join Our Email List Career Opportunities Site Map Owned By Copyright 2025 by Total e Integrated : Terms Of Use : Privacy Statement

Membership Tournament Calendar Groups & Events Tournaments & Outings Weddings & Banquets Explore More Dining Broward Amateur Championship Shop Career Opportunities Blogs FAQ Contact Us EXPERIENCE THE DIFFERENCE! Jacaranda Golf Club is South Florida’s premier golf destination offering two championship courses each rated 4 stars by Golf Digest. Our picturesque courses are suited for any skill level but don’t get lost in their beauty and charm, as you will soon discover the unique challenges each one presents. Both courses are woven into the natural tropical landscape that includes tranquil ponds and blue lagoons while you hear the gentle rustling of palm trees. With tight bunkering along the greens, tricky doglegs, and water hazards throughout, we’re sure you’ll find our courses both demanding and rewarding. After your round, stop into one of our two on-site Restaurants , The Grille Room or The 19th Hole. Whether you’re looking for a quick bite to eat, a leisurely lunch, or enjoying a beverage with friends, our friendly service staff will attend to your every need. We offer Golf Packages for those who are vacationing in the area, and we can host your next Corporate Event or Tournament . Get in touch with a member of our golf operations specialists today. We look forward to speaking with you soon.
